name: DarkZen Color Scheme
summary: DarkZen is an elegant and clean color scheme for Vim
description:
NOTE: this color scheme is now (for me) deprecated, use Satori color scheme (http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1614) instead.

DarkZen is a color scheme for black background terminals with elegant and clean look and feel. This color scheme was developed on Mac OS X terminal but it also looks great on Ubuntu Linux.

versions.release_notes: Fixed bug "color scheme name seems to be reset while loading it" reported by Hosup Chung.
